markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Preserving](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2302)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to a basket, bag, or other container

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Preserving_ runes are common among merchants and other travelers who are on the road for weeks or months at a time. Any non-magical food and drink inside a container with a _preserving_ rune remains fresher for longer, taking ten times as long to spoil. This feature doesn't prolong the duration of alchemical items.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Preserving
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 45 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Preserving (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Non-magical food and drink inside the container never spoil, and the rune has an activation.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The container casts [_cleanse cuisine_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1468) on all the food and drink within.
name: Preserving
